did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Calin Man collection of digital art, 2002-2003.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: CDs and textual material including net.art.kit, Das Wanderbuch e-story, kinema ikon and Calin Man re Voltaire archive.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: CDs and textual material including net.art.kit, Das Wanderbuch e-story, kinema ikon and Calin Man re Voltaire archive.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without permission from the Curator and artist(s).

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disk:PC only; Windows 98 or better, requires internet connection, DVD drive, media player and web browser.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Calin Man Collection of Digital Art, #8202. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
